description: For a restaurant-style meal at home, try this easy salmon recipe. Serve the dukkah-crusted salmon with a fresh Brussels sprouts and apple salad.
keywords: Salads,Pescatarian,Brussels sprout,Low salt,Winter,Weeknight dinner,Low sugar,Aug 2021,Fish,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Apple,Salmon
name: DukkahCrusted Salmon with Brussels Sprouts Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g baby Brussels sprouts, trimmed, thinly sliced
1 Pink Lady applex, trimmed, thinly sliced
0.33 cup Woolworths natural almond kernels, toasted, coarsely chopped
2 lemon, 1 juiced, 1 cut into cheeks (lemon cheeks to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place salmon on a plate and rub with 1 tbs oil. Sprinkle both sides with dukkah. Heat another 1 tbs oil in a medium frying pan over medium heat. Cook salmon for 3 minutes on each side or until cooked to your liking.
Meanwhile, place couscous in a heatproof bowl. Add 1 cup boiling water. Stir to combine. Cover and stand for 5 minutes. Stir with a fork to separate grains.
Place Brussels sprouts, apple, almonds, lemon juice and remaining oil in a bowl. Season and toss to combine. Serve salmon with couscous, salad and lemon cheeks.
